dcterms:description: The LSFD dataset is constructed and released by the authors, consisting of 94 bursts with focus bracketing and 30 high-resolution raw images for each burst, with pseudo ground truth computed using HeliconFocus software.
dcterms:title: Large-Scale Focus Dataset (LSFD)
